snippet: Bank of America has long rued its decision in 2008 to acquire Countrywide Financial, the subprime mortgage giant. But according to new documents filed in state Supreme Court in Manhattan, questionable practices by the bank's loan servicing unit have...
abstract: Bank of America has long rued its decision in 2008 to acquire Countrywide Financial, the subprime mortgage giant. But according to new documents filed in state Supreme Court in Manhattan, questionable practices by the bank's loan servicing unit have continued well after the Countrywide acquisition.
